name: Coco Crab
description:
What can a crab do?

From the creators of Fish & Trip, comes a new and completely funny arcade game.
Pick up bonus, collect gold coins, dodge and slice exotic fruits to survive with your beach crab.

Features:
• Move your crab with one touch
• Have fun with crazy power-ups
• Enjoy an original music & colorful graphics
• Discover & catch more than 50 crabs
• Play in 5 unique locations
• Complete dozens of missions
• Beware of Coconut Bombs!
